title: Your Game Plan: You can't fail. You just don't know it yet.
description: 'Your Game Plan' is a rallying cry and a call to action for men all over the world. With unwavering conviction and clarity Brett Murray presents a foundational truth - men have been saved and called for a purpose."For I know the plans I have for you," declares the Lord, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future."- Jeremiah 29:11 (NIV)In a society that increasingly marginalizes masculinity, men can find it really difficult to figure out who they are, their role in their family, their role in their community, their role even amongst their own friends. They are assailed by a new being a man is not a virtue; it is a liability.Speaking into that bleak picture, Brett Murray presents a fresh revelation of God's heart for men. "Your Game Plan," infused with hope from the very first page and presents the truth as it's found in the bible.God knows each man's days even before they've drawn a single breath. Each and every day is precious to him; they are not just the totality of each man's mortal existence; they are the beginning of his eternity. And God has a specific, powerful, and game-changing plan for each and every single man out there - a plan for life, health, and success.
author: Brett Murray
